QUESTION 1

```{r}
library(raster)
library(tidyverse)
library(getlandsat)
library(sf)
library(mapview)
library(osmdata)


bb = read.csv('data/uscities.csv') %>%
  filter(city == "Palo") %>%
  st_as_sf(coords = c("lng", "lat"), crs = 4326) %>%
  st_transform(5070) %>%
  st_buffer(5000) %>%
  st_bbox() %>%
  st_as_sfc() %>%
  st_as_sf()

bwgs = st_transform(bb, 4326)

osm = osmdata::opq(bwgs) %>%
  osmdata::add_osm_feature("building") %>%
  osmdata::osmdata_sf()

mapview(osm$osm_polygons)


```
